item.title: First certificate of a physical object
item.description: Object in inventory n°1990/2572-Dog-Est-B.Toro, Dogon votive statue (detail), anonymous, pre-20th century, 32x11x9 cm, © Richard A. Pierron, Galerie Sirius African Art, Mali, West-Africa. This October 2021, Uncopied was used for the first time to authenticate a secure Certificate of Inventory (CoI) for a physical work of inestimable cultural and heritage value. The object 1990/2572-Dog-Est-B.Toro is a votive statuette from the Dogon Country estimated to have been created in the first half of the 19th century or earlier.
